companies.name: Les Domaines Agricoles
companies.rationale: Les Domaines Agricoles is a leading Moroccan agricultural company involved in the production and export of fruits, vegetables, and other agricultural products.

companies.name: Atlantic Foods
companies.rationale: Atlantic Foods is a Moroccan company that specializes in the production and export of food products, including fruits, vegetables, and other agricultural products.

companies.name: Stellantis Morocco
companies.rationale: Stellantis Morocco is a subsidiary of the multinational automotive company Stellantis, and is involved in the production and sale of vehicles in Morocco.

companies.name: Méditérranée des Textiles
companies.rationale: Méditérranée des Textiles is a Moroccan company that specializes in the production and export of textile products, including clothing and other fabrics.

companies.name: Royal Air Maroc
companies.rationale: Royal Air Maroc is the national airline of Morocco, and is involved in the transportation of passengers and cargo by air.

companies.name: YoLa Fresh
companies.rationale: YoLa Fresh is a Moroccan agritech startup that specializes in the production and sale of fresh fruits and vegetables.

companies.name: ReBean
companies.rationale: ReBean is a Moroccan company that specializes in the production and sale of coffee and other food products.

companies.name: DEEPLEAF
companies.rationale: DEEPLEAF is a Moroccan agritech startup that specializes in the production and sale of smart farming solutions.

companies.name: GREEN WATECH Sarl
companies.rationale: GREEN WATECH Sarl is a Moroccan company that specializes in the production and sale of irrigation systems and other agricultural equipment.

companies.name: PHOTONAGRI (AgPhoton-Green-Révolution)
companies.rationale: PHOTONAGRI is a Moroccan company that specializes in the production and sale of agricultural equipment and solutions.
